question: Which Indian personality has been selected by the UNICEF to spread awareness on menstrual hygiene?
explanation:
Manushi Chillar, who won the title of Miss World in 2017 has joined hands with the United Nations Children's Fund (UNICEF) to spread awareness about menstrual hygiene.
Manushi runs an initiative on menstrual hygiene named Project Shakti. With this partnership, she will promote the efforts to educate girls about menstrual hygiene and to construct sanitation facilities. On May 28, World Menstrual Hygiene Day, she participated in UNICEF global initiative called the Red Dot Challenge.
